title: Need Script Font Id Help, Please
content:
I've tried everything I can think of to identify this script font so any help would be greatly appreciated. I apologize for the roughness as I needed to isolated it from a background in ps when I tried other identification options. Thank you so much. :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418180839im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sk_5613.jpg)
author: figrsk8r

comments.content: very similar in feel to Bodoni Classic Swashes. can we see the unedited sample?

I was able to find some additional characters as well.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418180839im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sk%20font%20id_4418.jpg)
found out the letters are hand designed so this post can be closed... thanks so much :)
